metadata.name: Reflecting suffering through esan patterns
metadata.description:
It is a reflection of the troubles, sufferings, sorrows and regrets that show the well-being of those who cannot demand anything.

        I picked up my local bamboo and Thai silk motifs. to blend with the Renaissance or European works in order to make the works out of the contemporary and unique style.

Technique :​ Draw a pen line on the canvas​
Size ​ : 145x170​ cm.
Year​ : 2021​-2022

[2885x3375 px]
